meanings.definition: The quality of being noble or honorable.
meanings.sent1: Her nobleness shone through when she helped the injured bird.
meanings.sent2: The king's nobleness was admired by all in the kingdom.
meanings.sent3: The nobleness of the knight's pet dragon made everyone chuckle.
meanings.sent4: The nobleness of the oak tree stood tall and proud in the forest.
meanings.sent5: The nobleness of the charity's work touched many hearts.

meanings.definition: A noble or honorable act or quality.
meanings.sent1: The nobleness of his gesture brought tears to her eyes.
meanings.sent2: She was known for her nobleness in always standing up for what was right.
meanings.sent3: The cat's nobleness in sharing its toy with the dog was quite amusing.
meanings.sent4: The nobleness of the sunrise painted the sky in hues of gold and pink.
meanings.sent5: His nobleness in forgiving others inspired those around him.
